mapper.insert: insert into t_commemorating_info (ID, commemorating_name, commemorating_desc, commemorating_story, image_name, commemorating_date, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commemoratingName}, #{commemoratingDesc}, #{commemoratingStory} , #{imageName}, #{commemoratingDate} #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_commemorating_info set commemorating_name = #{commemoratingDate}, commemorating_desc = #{commemoratingDesc}, commemorating_story = #{commemoratingStory}, image_name = #{imageName}, commemorating_date = #{commemoratingDate}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
